> Mike how do you plan to do the experiment?
> 
> I have some thoughts on this.
> 
> You said you have some items.
> 
> Find a location out in the middle of nowhere, and just bring your 
recording equipment. Try for 15 minutes to see if you can get any 
spirits.
> 
> Then go to that same location, lets say the next day and bring the 
items you have, and then try and record again for about 15 minutes.
> 
> It will be interesting if you then pick up a spirit by just having 
the items with you.
> 
> With my radio I can not hear realtime, but if you have a device 
where you can hear real time, on the day you go back to that remote 
location but with the items, if you do get spirits, try to inquire if 
they are tied to the item you have.
> 
> Mike Edwards
